name: Back To School (angelerinooo)
description:
Currently developing this game, my first game, for a end of Bachelor's project.

This game is based in the RPG / Roguelite genre with procedural dungeons.

Currently some of the artwork is not made by me, but by https://krishna-palacio.itch.io/. Next iteration is going to have my own artwork.

Note that it is still a work in progress, with only one level, and I welcome any feedback. You can let me know what you think by filling in this form: https://forms.gle/dfUiw7NR4BTetRRJA
